Title: Camp Grounded
Plot: Cate, Ryan, Baze, and Math volunteer to chaperon Lux's school camping trip. During the trip, tension rises between Cate and Ryan, while Baze grows closer to Emma. As Lux gets more intimate with Eric, Tasha urges her not to take that risk with her future.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Ksenia Solo (Tasha), Austin Butler (Jones), Shaun Sipos (Eric Daniels), Emma Caulfield (Emma Bradshaw)
